mapper.sql: RQST_NO , RQST_SNO , DDL_GRT_ID , RQST_DCD , RVW_STS_CD , RVW_CONTS , VRF_CD , VRF_RMK , GRTOR_DB_ID , GRTOR_DB_PNM , GRTOR_SCH_ID , GRTOR_SCH_PNM , DDL_OBJ_ID , DDL_OBJ_PNM , DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD , GRTED_DB_ID , GRTED_DB_PNM , GRTED_SCH_ID , GRTED_SCH_PNM , SELECT_YN , INSERT_YN , UPDATE_YN , DELETE_YN , EXECUTE_YN , SYNONYM_YN , SCRT_INFO , OBJ_DESCN , OBJ_VERS , REG_TYP_CD , FRS_RQST_DTM , FRS_RQST_USER_ID , RQST_DTM , RQST_USER_ID , APRV_DTM , APRV_USER_ID , RQST_RESN , DDL_OBJ_LNM , SELECT_WITH_GRT_YN , INSERT_WITH_GRT_YN , UPDATE_WITH_GRT_YN , DELETE_WITH_GRT_YN , EXECUTE_WITH_GRT_YN

A.RQST_NO, A.RQST_SNO, A.DDL_GRT_ID, A.RQST_DCD, A.RVW_CONTS, A.VRF_CD, A.VRF_RMK, A.GRTOR_DB_ID, A.GRTOR_DB_PNM, A.GRTOR_SCH_ID, A.GRTOR_SCH_PNM, A.DDL_OBJ_ID, A.DDL_OBJ_PNM, A.DDL_OBJ_LNM, A.DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD, A.GRTED_DB_ID, A.GRTED_DB_PNM, A.GRTED_SCH_ID, A.GRTED_SCH_PNM, A.SELECT_YN, A.INSERT_YN, A.UPDATE_YN, A.DELETE_YN, A.EXECUTE_YN, A.SYNONYM_YN, A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS, A.REG_TYP_CD, A.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID, A.APRV_DTM, A.APRV_USER_ID, A.RQST_RESN
mapper.insert: insert into WAQ_DDL_GRT (RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, DDL_GRT_ID, RQST_DCD, RVW_STS_CD, RVW_CONTS, VRF_CD, VRF_RMK GRTOR_DB_ID, GRTOR_DB_PNM, GRTOR_SCH_ID, GRTOR_SCH_PNM, DDL_OBJ_ID, DDL_OBJ_PNM, DDL_OBJ_LNM, DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD, GRTED_DB_ID, GRTED_DB_PNM, GRTED_SCH_ID, GRTED_SCH_PNM, SELECT_YN, INSERT_YN, UPDATE_YN, DELETE_YN, EXECUTE_YN, SYNONYM_YN, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, RQST_RESN ) values (#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ddlGrtId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grtorDbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grtorDbPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grtorSchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grtorSchPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ddlObjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ddlObjPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ddlObjLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ddlObjTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grtedDbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grtedDbPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grtedSchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grtedSchPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{selectYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insertYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{executeYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{synonymYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstResn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(RQST_SNO),0) + 1 AS RQST_SNO FROM WAQ_DDL_GRT WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:

mapper.update:
update WAQ_DDL_GRT
DDL_GRT_ID = #{ddlGrtId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GRTOR_DB_ID = #{grtorDbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GRTOR_DB_PNM = #{grtorDbPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GRTOR_SCH_ID = #{grtorSchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GRTOR_SCH_PNM = #{grtorSchPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DDL_OBJ_ID = #{ddlObjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DDL_OBJ_PNM = #{ddlObjPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DDL_OBJ_LNM = #{ddlObjLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD = #{ddlObjTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GRTED_DB_ID = #{grtedDbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GRTED_DB_PNM = #{grtedDbPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GRTED_SCH_ID = #{grtedSchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GRTED_SCH_PNM = #{grtedSchPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SELECT_YN = #{selectYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INSERT_YN = #{insertYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_YN = #{updateYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETE_YN = #{deleteYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXECUTE_YN = #{executeYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYNONYM_YN = #{synonymYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_RESN = #{rqstResn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update WAQ_DDL_GRT set DDL_GRT_ID = #{ddlGrtId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRTOR_DB_ID = #{grtorDbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRTOR_DB_PNM = #{grtorDbPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRTOR_SCH_ID = #{grtorSchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRTOR_SCH_PNM = #{grtorSchPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DDL_OBJ_ID = #{ddlObjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DDL_OBJ_PNM = #{ddlObjPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DDL_OBJ_LNM = #{ddlObjLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD = #{ddlObjTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRTED_DB_ID = #{grtedDbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRTED_DB_PNM = #{grtedDbPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRTED_SCH_ID = #{grtedSchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRTED_SCH_PNM = #{grtedSchPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SELECT_YN = #{selectYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INSERT_YN = #{insertYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_YN = #{updateYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELETE_YN = #{deleteYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXECUTE_YN = #{executeYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYNONYM_YN = #{synonymYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_RESN = #{rqstResn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
--DDL 오브젝트 요청서 리스트 조회 SELECT
, CASE WHEN A.RVW_STS_CD = '2' THEN '2' ELSE '0' END AS RVW_STS_CD
, A.RVW_STS_CD
--, CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '2' THEN '#FF0000' END AS FontColor , CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '2' THEN '#FF0000' ELSE CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '5' THEN '#0000FF' END END AS FontColor , GET_USER_NM(A.RQST_USER_ID) AS RQST_USER_NM FROM WAQ_DDL_GRT A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo}
AND A.VRF_CD = '1'
ORDER BY RQST_SNO
mapper.insert:
--검증쿼리 : 요청서내 중복(DDG01) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DDL_GRT D WHERE A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.GRTOR_DB_PNM = D.GRTOR_DB_PNM AND A.GRTOR_SCH_PNM = D.GRTOR_SCH_PNM AND A.DDL_OBJ_PNM = D.DDL_OBJ_PNM AND A.GRTED_DB_PNM = D.GRTED_DB_PNM AND A.GRTED_SCH_PNM = D.GRTED_SCH_PNM AND A.RQST_SNO != D.RQST_SNO
)

--검증쿼리 : 삭제대상 오브젝트 미존재(DDG02) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DDL_GRT D WHERE A.GRTOR_DB_PNM = D.GRTOR_DB_PNM AND A.GRTOR_SCH_PNM = D.GRTOR_SCH_PNM AND A.DDL_OBJ_PNM = D.DDL_OBJ_PNM AND A.GRTED_DB_PNM = D.GRTED_DB_PNM AND A.GRTED_SCH_PNM = D.GRTED_SCH_PNM AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U'))

--검증쿼리 : 요청중인 오브젝트 (DDG03) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_MSTR E INNER JOIN WAQ_DDL_GRT D ON E.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO WHERE E.RQST_NO != #{rqstNo} AND E.RQST_STEP_CD = 'Q' AND A.GRTOR_DB_PNM = D.GRTOR_DB_PNM AND A.GRTOR_SCH_PNM = D.GRTOR_SCH_PNM AND A.DDL_OBJ_PNM = D.DDL_OBJ_PNM AND A.GRTED_DB_PNM = D.GRTED_DB_PNM AND A.GRTED_SCH_PNM = D.GRTED_SCH_PNM AND NVL(D.RVW_STS_CD, 0) != '2' )
--검증쿼리 : DB접속정보 미존재(DDG04) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND (A.GRTOR_DB_ID IS NULL OR A.GRTED_DB_ID IS NULL)
--검증쿼리 : DB스키마 미존재(DDG05) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND (A.GRTOR_SCH_ID IS NULL OR A.GRTED_SCH_ID IS NULL)

--검증쿼리 : 변경일 때 변경된 데이터가 없을 경우 (DDG00) AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'U' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DDL_GRT D WHERE A.GRTOR_DB_PNM = D.GRTOR_DB_PNM AND A.GRTOR_SCH_PNM = D.GRTOR_SCH_PNM AND A.DDL_OBJ_PNM = D.DDL_OBJ_PNM AND A.DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD = D.DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD AND A.GRTED_DB_PNM = D.GRTED_DB_PNM AND A.GRTED_SCH_PNM = D.GRTED_SCH_PNM
AND NVL(A.SELECT_YN, '_') = NVL(D.SELECT_YN, '_') AND NVL(A.INSERT_YN, '_') = NVL(D.INSERT_YN, '_') AND NVL(A.UPDATE_YN, '_') = NVL(D.UPDATE_YN, '_') AND NVL(A.DELETE_YN, '_') = NVL(D.DELETE_YN, '_') --AND NVL(A.EXECUTE_YN, '_') = NVL(D.EXECUTE_YN, '_') --AND NVL(A.SYNONYM_YN, '_') = NVL(D.SYNONYM_YN, '_') AND NVL(A.OBJ_DESCN, '_') = NVL(D.OBJ_DESCN, '_') --AND NVL(A.DDL_OBJ_LNM, '_') = NVL(D.DDL_OBJ_LNM, '_') )
mapper.update: --요청구분 업데이트 UPDATE WAQ_DDL_GRT A SET (A.REG_TYP_CD, A.DDL_GRT_ID) = ( SELECT CASE WHEN A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' THEN 'D' ELSE CASE WHEN MAX(B.DDL_GRT_ID ) IS NULL THEN 'C' ELSE 'U' END END , MAX(B.DDL_GRT_ID) AS DDL_GRT_ID FROM WAM_DDL_GRT B WHERE B.GRTOR_DB_ID = A.GRTOR_DB_ID AND B.GRTOR_SCH_ID = A.GRTOR_SCH_ID AND B.DDL_OBJ_PNM = A.DDL_OBJ_PNM AND B.GRTED_DB_ID = A.GRTED_DB_ID AND B.GRTED_SCH_ID = A.GRTED_SCH_ID ) , A.VRF_CD = '4' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

-- 각종 ID 업데이트 UPDATE WAQ_DDL_GRT A SET (A.GRTOR_DB_ID, A.GRTOR_SCH_ID ) = ( SELECT MAX(D.DB_CONN_TRG_ID), MAX(C.DB_SCH_ID) FROM WAA_DB_SCH C INNER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG D ON D.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND D.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = C.DB_CONN_TRG_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND D.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM = A.GRTOR_DB_PNM AND C.DB_SCH_PNM = A.GRTOR_SCH_PNM AND C.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ) , A.VRF_CD = '4' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE WAQ_DDL_GRT
RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd} , RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts} , APRV_DTM = SYSDATE , APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId} ,
WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND VRF_CD = '1' AND NVL(RVW_STS_CD, '_') != '2'
mapper.select: --신규 적재 대상 추출 SELECT * FROM WAQ_DDL_GRT WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인 AND REG_TYP_CD = 'C'
mapper.update: --WAQ ID, VERS 등을 업데이트... UPDATE WAQ_DDL_GRT A SET (DDL_GRT_ID, OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID) = ( SELECT B.DDL_GRT_ID AS DDL_GRT_ID , NVL(B.OBJ_VERS, 0) + 1 AS OBJ_VERS , B.FRS_RQST_DTM , B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID FROM WAM_DDL_GRT B INNER JOIN WAA_DB_SCH S ON B.GRTOR_SCH_ID = S.DB_SCH_ID AND S.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND S.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG D ON D.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = S.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND D.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAA_DB_ROLE S2 ON B.GRTED_SCH_ID = S2.ROLE_ID AND S2.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND S2.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG D2 ON D2.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = S2.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND D2.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND D2.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE B.DDL_OBJ_PNM = A.DDL_OBJ_PNM AND S.DB_SCH_PNM = A.GRTOR_SCH_PNM AND D.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM = A.GRTOR_DB_PNM AND B.DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD = A.DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD AND S2.ROLE_PNM = A.GRTED_SCH_PNM AND D2.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM = A.GRTED_DB_PNM ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} --AND A.VRF_CD = '1' --등록가능 AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_DDL_GRT B INNER JOIN WAA_DB_SCH S ON B.GRTOR_SCH_ID = S.DB_SCH_ID AND S.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND S.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG D ON D.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = S.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND D.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAA_DB_ROLE S2 ON B.GRTED_SCH_ID = S2.ROLE_ID AND S2.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND S2.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG D2 ON D2.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = S2.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND D2.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND D2.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE B.DDL_OBJ_PNM = A.DDL_OBJ_PNM AND S.DB_SCH_PNM = A.GRTOR_SCH_PNM AND D.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM = A.GRTOR_DB_PNM AND B.DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD = A.DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD AND S2.ROLE_PNM = A.GRTED_SCH_PNM AND D2.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM = A.GRTED_DB_PNM )
mapper.sql:
, GRTOR_DB_ID, GRTOR_DB_PNM, GRTOR_SCH_ID, GRTOR_SCH_PNM , DDL_OBJ_ID, DDL_OBJ_PNM, DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD , GRTED_DB_ID, GRTED_DB_PNM, GRTED_SCH_ID, GRTED_SCH_PNM , SELECT_YN, INSERT_YN, UPDATE_YN, DELETE_YN, EXECUTE_YN, SYNONYM_YN
, PRC_TYP_CD , PRC_DT , PRC_DBA_ID , RQST_NO , RQST_SNO
, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID , RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, SCRT_INFO, RQST_RESN, DDL_OBJ_LNM

, GRTOR_DB_ID, GRTOR_DB_PNM, GRTOR_SCH_ID, GRTOR_SCH_PNM , DDL_OBJ_ID, DDL_OBJ_PNM, DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD , GRTED_DB_ID, GRTED_DB_PNM, GRTED_SCH_ID, GRTED_SCH_PNM , SELECT_YN, INSERT_YN, UPDATE_YN, DELETE_YN, EXECUTE_YN, SYNONYM_YN
, NULL AS PRC_TYP_CD , NULL AS PRC_DT , NULL AS PRC_DBA_ID , RQST_NO , RQST_SNO
, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID , RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, SCRT_INFO, RQST_RESN, DDL_OBJ_LNM
mapper.delete: --WAM 삭제 (등록유형코드가REG_TYP_CD 변경, 삭제일 경우) DELETE FROM WAM_DDL_GRT A WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DDL_GRT B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.VRF_CD = '1' AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND B.DDL_GRT_ID = A.DDL_GRT_ID )
mapper.update: --WAH 이력 만료... UPDATE WAH_DDL_GRT A SET EXP_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DDL_GRT B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.VRF_CD = '1' AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND B.DDL_GRT_ID = A.DDL_GRT_ID )
mapper.select:
--DDL오브젝트 변경대상 조회... SELECT A.DDL_GRT_ID , 'I' AS IBS_STATUS , A.DDL_OBJ_PNM AS DDL_OBJ_PNM , A.DDL_OBJ_LNM AS DDL_OBJ_LNM , #{reqmst.rqstDcd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS RQST_DCD , A.GRTOR_DB_ID AS GRTOR_DB_ID , DB.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM AS GRTOR_DB_PNM , A.GRTOR_SCH_ID AS GRTOR_SCH_ID , S.DB_SCH_PNM AS GRTOR_SCH_PNM
, A.GRTED_DB_ID AS GRTED_DB_ID , DB2.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM AS GRTED_DB_PNM , A.GRTED_SCH_ID AS GRTED_SCH_ID , S2.ROLE_PNM AS GRTED_SCH_PNM
, A.DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD AS DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD , A.SCRT_INFO AS SCRT_INFO , A.OBJ_DESCN AS OBJ_DESCN , A.RQST_RESN AS RQST_RESN , CASE WHEN A.SELECT_YN = 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE '' END SELECT_YN , CASE WHEN A.INSERT_YN = 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE '' END INSERT_YN , CASE WHEN A.UPDATE_YN = 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE '' END UPDATE_YN , CASE WHEN A.DELETE_YN = 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE '' END DELETE_YN , CASE WHEN A.EXECUTE_YN = 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE '' END EXECUTE_YN FROM WAM_DDL_GRT A LEFT JOIN WAA_DB_SCH S ON A.GRTOR_SCH_ID = S.DB_SCH_ID AND S.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND S.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') LEFT JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG DB ON A.GRTOR_DB_ID = DB.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND DB.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND DB.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
LEFT JOIN WAA_DB_ROLE S2 ON A.GRTED_SCH_ID = S2.ROLE_ID AND S2.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND S2.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') LEFT JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG DB2 ON A.GRTED_DB_ID = DB2.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND DB2.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND DB2.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
WHERE A.DDL_GRT_ID IN
#{item.ddlGrtId}
mapper.update: -- 각종 ID 업데이트 UPDATE WAQ_DDL_GRT A SET (A.DDL_OBJ_ID, A.DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD, A.DDL_OBJ_LNM) = ( SELECT MAX(O.DDL_OBJ_ID),MAX(DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD),MAX(O.DDL_OBJ_LNM) FROM WAA_DB_SCH C INNER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG D ON D.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND D.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = C.DB_CONN_TRG_ID INNER JOIN (SELECT T.DB_SCH_ID ,T.DDL_TBL_PNM AS DDL_OBJ_PNM ,T.DDL_TBL_ID AS DDL_OBJ_ID ,'TBL' AS DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD ,T.DDL_TBL_LNM AS DDL_OBJ_LNM FROM WAM_DDL_TBL T UNION ALL SELECT T.DB_SCH_ID ,T.DDL_SEQ_PNM AS DDL_OBJ_PNM ,T.DDL_SEQ_ID AS DDL_OBJ_ID ,'SEQ' AS DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD ,T.DDL_SEQ_LNM AS DDL_OBJ_LNM FROM WAM_DDL_SEQ T UNION ALL SELECT T.DB_SCH_ID ,T.DDL_ETC_PNM AS DDL_OBJ_PNM ,T.DDL_ETC_ID AS DDL_OBJ_ID ,T.ETC_OBJ_DCD AS DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD ,T.DDL_ETC_LNM AS DDL_OBJ_LNM FROM WAM_DDL_ETC T ) O ON O.DB_SCH_ID = C.DB_SCH_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND D.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM = A.GRTOR_DB_PNM AND C.DB_SCH_PNM = A.GRTOR_SCH_PNM AND O.DDL_OBJ_PNM = A.DDL_OBJ_PNM AND C.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ) , A.VRF_CD = '4' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

-- 오브젝트 별 권한 'N'처리 UPDATE WAQ_DDL_GRT A SET (SELECT_YN,INSERT_YN,UPDATE_YN,DELETE_YN,EXECUTE_YN) = (SELECT CASE WHEN A.DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD = 'TBL' THEN B.SELECT_YN WHEN A.DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD = 'SEQ' THEN B.SELECT_YN WHEN A.DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD = 'VIEW' THEN B.SELECT_YN WHEN A.DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD = 'FUNC' THEN 'N' WHEN A.DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD = 'PROC' THEN 'N' END AS SELECT_YN ,CASE WHEN A.DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD = 'TBL' THEN B.INSERT_YN WHEN A.DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD = 'SEQ' THEN 'N' WHEN A.DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD = 'VIEW' THEN 'N' WHEN A.DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD = 'FUNC' THEN 'N' WHEN A.DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD = 'PROC' THEN 'N' END AS INSERT_YN ,CASE WHEN A.DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD = 'TBL' THEN B.UPDATE_YN WHEN A.DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD = 'SEQ' THEN 'N' WHEN A.DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD = 'VIEW' THEN 'N' WHEN A.DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD = 'FUNC' THEN 'N' WHEN A.DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD = 'PROC' THEN 'N' END AS UPDATE_YN ,CASE WHEN A.DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD = 'TBL' THEN B.DELETE_YN WHEN A.DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD = 'SEQ' THEN 'N' WHEN A.DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD = 'VIEW' THEN 'N' WHEN A.DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD = 'FUNC' THEN 'N' WHEN A.DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD = 'PROC' THEN 'N' END AS DELETE_YN ,CASE WHEN A.DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD = 'TBL' THEN 'N' WHEN A.DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD = 'SEQ' THEN 'N' WHEN A.DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD = 'VIEW' THEN 'N' WHEN A.DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD = 'FUNC' THEN B.EXECUTE_YN WHEN A.DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD = 'PROC' THEN B.EXECUTE_YN END AS EXECUTE_YN FROM WAQ_DDL_GRT B WHERE A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = B.RQST_SNO ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD IS NOT NULL
mapper.insert: --검증쿼리 : DBMS가 다름(DDG06) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.GRTOR_DB_PNM != GRTED_DB_PNM
--검증쿼리 : 오브젝트 미존재(DDG07) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.DDL_OBJ_ID IS NULL
--검증쿼리 : 권한 미존재(DDG08) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND SELECT_YN = 'N' AND INSERT_YN = 'N' AND UPDATE_YN = 'N' AND DELETE_YN = 'N' AND EXECUTE_YN = 'N'
--검증쿼리 : 한요청서에 여러 스키마 권한을 요청할 수 없음(권한을 주는 스키마에 대한 결재자를 선택해야 하기 때문에)(DDG09) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_DDL_GRT B WHERE A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND A.GRTOR_SCH_PNM != B.GRTOR_SCH_PNM )
--검증쿼리 : GRANTOR 에게 기본적으로 부여된 권한에 권한을 신청할 경우(DDG10) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND REPLACE(A.GRTOR_SCH_PNM,'OWN') = REPLACE(REPLACE(A.GRTED_SCH_PNM,'RL_'),'_RCV')

--검증쿼리 : 권한 요청용 ROLE 말고 스키마매핑용 ROLE로 권한을 요청하는 경우(DDG11) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAA_DB_ROLE B WHERE B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND B.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') AND A.GRTED_SCH_ID = B.ROLE_ID )

INSERT INTO WAQ_DDL_GRT ( RQST_NO ,RQST_SNO ,DDL_GRT_ID ,RQST_DCD ,RVW_STS_CD ,RVW_CONTS ,VRF_CD ,VRF_RMK ,GRTOR_DB_ID ,GRTOR_DB_PNM ,GRTOR_SCH_ID ,GRTOR_SCH_PNM ,DDL_OBJ_ID ,DDL_OBJ_PNM ,DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD ,GRTED_DB_ID ,GRTED_DB_PNM ,GRTED_SCH_ID ,GRTED_SCH_PNM ,SELECT_YN ,INSERT_YN ,UPDATE_YN ,DELETE_YN ,EXECUTE_YN ,SYNONYM_YN ,SCRT_INFO ,OBJ_DESCN ,OBJ_VERS ,REG_TYP_CD ,FRS_RQST_DTM ,FRS_RQST_USER_ID ,RQST_DTM ,RQST_USER_ID ,APRV_DTM ,APRV_USER_ID ,RQST_RESN ,DDL_OBJ_LNM ) SELECT A.RQST_NO ,ROWNUM AS RQST_SNO ,A.DDL_GRT_ID ,A.RQST_DCD ,A.RVW_STS_CD ,A.RVW_CONTS ,A.VRF_CD ,A.VRF_RMK ,A.GRTOR_DB_ID ,A.GRTOR_DB_PNM ,A.GRTOR_SCH_ID ,A.GRTOR_SCH_PNM ,A.DDL_OBJ_ID ,A.DDL_OBJ_PNM ,A.DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD ,A.GRTED_DB_ID ,A.GRTED_DB_PNM ,A.GRTED_SCH_ID ,A.GRTED_SCH_PNM ,A.SELECT_YN ,A.INSERT_YN ,A.UPDATE_YN ,A.DELETE_YN ,A.EXECUTE_YN ,A.SYNONYM_YN ,A.SCRT_INFO ,A.OBJ_DESCN ,A.OBJ_VERS ,A.REG_TYP_CD ,A.FRS_RQST_DTM ,A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID ,A.RQST_DTM ,A.RQST_USER_ID ,A.APRV_DTM ,A.APRV_USER_ID ,A.RQST_RESN ,A.DDL_OBJ_LNM
FROM (
SELECT B.RQST_NO --,ROWNUM AS RQST_SNO ,DDL_GRT_ID ,'DD' AS RQST_DCD ,'1' AS RVW_STS_CD ,'GRANTOR 테이블 삭제로 자동 삭제' AS RVW_CONTS ,'1' AS VRF_CD ,'' AS VRF_RMK ,A.GRTOR_DB_ID ,A.GRTOR_DB_PNM ,A.GRTOR_SCH_ID ,A.GRTOR_SCH_PNM ,A.DDL_OBJ_ID ,A.DDL_OBJ_PNM ,A.DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD ,A.GRTED_DB_ID ,A.GRTED_DB_PNM ,A.GRTED_SCH_ID ,A.GRTED_SCH_PNM ,A.SELECT_YN ,A.INSERT_YN ,A.UPDATE_YN ,A.DELETE_YN ,A.EXECUTE_YN ,A.SYNONYM_YN ,'' AS SCRT_INFO ,A.OBJ_DESCN ,A.OBJ_VERS ,'D' AS REG_TYP_CD ,A.FRS_RQST_DTM ,A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID ,B.RQST_DTM -- ,B.RQST_USER_ID -- ,B.APRV_DTM -- ,B.APRV_USER_ID -- ,A.RQST_RESN ,A.DDL_OBJ_LNM FROM WAM_DDL_GRT A
INNER JOIN WAH_DDL_TBL B ON A.GRTOR_SCH_ID = B.DB_SCH_ID AND A.DDL_OBJ_PNM = B.DDL_TBL_PNM AND B.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') AND B.REG_TYP_CD = 'D' WHERE 1=1 AND B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
UNION ALL
SELECT B.RQST_NO --,ROWNUM AS RQST_SNO ,DDL_GRT_ID ,'DD' AS RQST_DCD ,'1' AS RVW_STS_CD ,'GRANTOR 오브젝트 삭제로 자동 삭제' AS RVW_CONTS ,'1' AS VRF_CD ,'' AS VRF_RMK ,A.GRTOR_DB_ID ,A.GRTOR_DB_PNM ,A.GRTOR_SCH_ID ,A.GRTOR_SCH_PNM ,A.DDL_OBJ_ID ,A.DDL_OBJ_PNM ,A.DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD ,A.GRTED_DB_ID ,A.GRTED_DB_PNM ,A.GRTED_SCH_ID ,A.GRTED_SCH_PNM ,A.SELECT_YN ,A.INSERT_YN ,A.UPDATE_YN ,A.DELETE_YN ,A.EXECUTE_YN ,A.SYNONYM_YN ,'' AS SCRT_INFO ,A.OBJ_DESCN ,A.OBJ_VERS ,'D' AS REG_TYP_CD ,A.FRS_RQST_DTM ,A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID ,B.RQST_DTM -- ,B.RQST_USER_ID -- ,B.APRV_DTM -- ,B.APRV_USER_ID -- ,A.RQST_RESN ,A.DDL_OBJ_LNM FROM WAM_DDL_GRT A
INNER JOIN WAH_DDL_OBJ B ON A.GRTOR_SCH_ID = B.DB_SCH_ID AND A.DDL_OBJ_PNM = B.DDL_OBJ_PNM AND B.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') AND B.REG_TYP_CD = 'D' WHERE 1=1 AND B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
UNION ALL
SELECT B.RQST_NO --,ROWNUM AS RQST_SNO ,DDL_GRT_ID ,'DD' AS RQST_DCD ,'' AS RVW_STS_CD ,'GRANTOR 시퀀스 삭제로 자동 삭제' AS RVW_CONTS ,'1' AS VRF_CD ,'' AS VRF_RMK ,A.GRTOR_DB_ID ,A.GRTOR_DB_PNM ,A.GRTOR_SCH_ID ,A.GRTOR_SCH_PNM ,A.DDL_OBJ_ID ,A.DDL_OBJ_PNM ,A.DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD ,A.GRTED_DB_ID ,A.GRTED_DB_PNM ,A.GRTED_SCH_ID ,A.GRTED_SCH_PNM ,A.SELECT_YN ,A.INSERT_YN ,A.UPDATE_YN ,A.DELETE_YN ,A.EXECUTE_YN ,A.SYNONYM_YN ,'' AS SCRT_INFO ,A.OBJ_DESCN ,A.OBJ_VERS ,'D' AS REG_TYP_CD ,A.FRS_RQST_DTM ,A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID ,B.RQST_DTM -- ,B.RQST_USER_ID -- ,B.APRV_DTM -- ,B.APRV_USER_ID -- ,A.RQST_RESN ,A.DDL_OBJ_LNM FROM WAM_DDL_GRT A
INNER JOIN WAH_DDL_SEQ B ON A.GRTOR_SCH_ID = B.DB_SCH_ID AND A.DDL_OBJ_PNM = B.DDL_SEQ_PNM AND B.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') AND B.REG_TYP_CD = 'D' WHERE 1=1 AND B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) A

INSERT INTO WAQ_DDL_GRT () SELECT #{reqmst.rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , RQST_SNO , DDL_GRT_ID , RQST_DCD , NULL , NULL , NULL , NULL , GRTOR_DB_ID , GRTOR_DB_PNM , GRTOR_SCH_ID , GRTOR_SCH_PNM , DDL_OBJ_ID , DDL_OBJ_PNM , DDL_OBJ_TYP_CD , GRTED_DB_ID , GRTED_DB_PNM , GRTED_SCH_ID , GRTED_SCH_PNM , SELECT_YN , INSERT_YN , UPDATE_YN , DELETE_YN , EXECUTE_YN , SYNONYM_YN , SCRT_INFO , OBJ_DESCN , OBJ_VERS , REG_TYP_CD , FRS_RQST_DTM , FRS_RQST_USER_ID , RQST_DTM , RQST_USER_ID , NULL , NULL , RQST_RESN , DDL_OBJ_LNM , SELECT_WITH_GRT_YN , INSERT_WITH_GRT_YN , UPDATE_WITH_GRT_YN , DELETE_WITH_GRT_YN , EXECUTE_WITH_GRT_YN FROM WAQ_DDL_GRT WHERE RQST_NO = #{oldRqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RVW_STS_CD = '2'
